Interface DeckInterface

    • Method Detail

      • makeDeck

        java.util.Queue<Card> makeDeck(java.util.Queue<Card> deckOfCards)
        Make Deck
        Parameters:
        deckOfCards - The deck of cards that will be used.
        Returns:
        Returns a queue that acts as a deck of cards.
        Ensure:
        The deckOfCards is to be filled with 52 valid and non-repeating cards.
        Require:
        A valid deckOfCards object is instantiated.

      • getDeckOfCards

        java.util.Queue<Card> getDeckOfCards()
        Get Deck of Cards
        Returns:
        Returns a queue that acts as a deck of cards.
        Ensure:
        All 52 cards will be retrieved.
        Require:
        A valid deck of cards is created.

      • setDeckOfCards

        void setDeckOfCards(java.util.Queue<Card> deckOfCards)
        Set Deck of Cards
        Parameters:
        deckOfCards - The deck of cards that will be used.
        Ensure:
        The deck of cards is set and updated to reflect any changes.
        Require:
        Reasonable need for the deck of cards to be set, such as when shuffling.

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        To String
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Returns a String of what's in the queue (deck of cards).
        Ensure:
        The deck of cards is retrieved.
        Require:
        A valid deck of cards is created.

      • shuffleDeck

        void shuffleDeck()
        Shuffle Deck
        Ensure:
        All cards in the deck will be shuffled and reorganized randomly.
        Require:
        A valid deck of cards is created.

      • moveToBottom

        void moveToBottom(Card newBottom)
        Move To Bottom
        Parameters:
        newBottom - The card to be moved to the bottom.
        Ensure:
        The used card is passed to the bottom of the deck.
        Require:
        A valid deck of cards is created and a card is to be reused.

      • draw

        Card draw()
        Draw
        Returns:
        Returns the card that was on the top of the deck of cards.
        Ensure:
        The first card of the deck is to be retrieved.
        Require:
        A valid deck of cards is created.
